questions.question: Binary search requires the input array to be:
questions.explanation: Without sorted order, halving by comparison is invalid.

questions.question: Which bounds are commonly tracked?
questions.explanation: Most implementations maintain low/high or left/right indices.

questions.question: Time complexity of binary search is:
questions.explanation: Each comparison halves the remaining search range.

questions.question: Space complexity for iterative binary search is typically:
questions.explanation: The iterative version uses constant extra memory.
